parragraps.tittleinit: I'm passionate about the intersection where data comes to life through development. I build interactive tools and web solutions that facilitate evidence-based decision-making.
parragraps.tittle2: I am passionate about transforming information into strategic decisions. My professional career, which began with roles in auditing and quality monitoring at companies such as:
parragraps.tittle3: I have provided a solid foundation in handling and debugging large volumes of data, always ensuring its integrity through statistical sampling and rigorous control.
parragraps.tittle4: My journey has allowed me not only to identify and report on key metrics but also to optimize processes through the development of automations like scripts and macros. This hands-on experience in operational quality management was the catalyst that sparked my interest in delving deeper into data science to go beyond simple analysis.
parragraps.tittle5: and with ongoing training on platforms like:
parragraps.tittle6: my goal is clear: to merge my analytical skills with web development. I aspire to build more robust and interactive projects, where data is not only analyzed but presented through intuitive web solutions that allow for quicker and more accurate decision-making. I seek opportunities where I can apply this vision to optimize business processes and provide innovative solutions based on empirical evidence.
parragraps.tittle7: Platzi, Coursera, Google Cloud, SENATIC and free platforms of Bootcamps taught by MINTICS, my goal is clear: to merge my analytical skills with web development. I aspire to build more robust and interactive projects, where data is not only analyzed but presented through intuitive web solutions that allow for quicker and more accurate decision-making. I seek opportunities where I can apply this vision to optimize business processes and provide innovative solutions based on empirical evidence.

contact.p2: Do you have a question, a proposal, or just want to say hi? Send me a message.

proyects.title: Personal Portfolio
proyects.description: My personal portfolio built with React, Vite, and Tailwind CSS, showcasing my skills in front-end development and data visualization.
